goal.en: 1. Understand and make good use of the artistic resources of the Humanities and Arts Center of our school 2. Participate in art and cultural activities, and understand the connotation of art and cultural work from the sharing of practitioners.
goal.ch: 一、認識並善用本校人文藝術中心的藝術資源 二、實際參與藝文活動，從實務工作者的分享認識藝文工作的內涵。

content.en:
1. Course description
2. Teacher Yang Shunru gave a lecture: Art Therapy
3. Art work plan writing
4. The Realm of Cannibalism - Liang Tingyu Solo Exhibition Opening and Guided Tour
5. The Production Team of Tropical Angels: Taking "Tropical Angels" as an example, thinking about the creation of literary translation musicals
6. Lecture by Zhou Yijie: What about public art? Public art case sharing
7. Introduction to Chinese Opera and Guided Tour of Kunqu Opera Museum
8. Wu Peirong: Japanese Buddhist Art
9. Guide to the Opening of the School Celebration Exhibition
10. Chen Yiling: Cultural Policy
11. Taipei Performing Arts Troupe performing
content.ch:
一、課程說明
二、楊舜如老師主講：藝術治療
三、藝術工作企劃撰寫
四、食人之界－梁廷毓個展開幕暨導覽活動
五、熱帶天使製作團隊：以《熱帶天使》爲例，文學轉譯音樂劇的創作思考
六、周逸傑主講：公共藝術怎麼辦？ 公共藝術案例分享
七、戲曲概說、崑曲博物館導覽
八、巫佩蓉：日本佛教藝術
九、校慶展覽開幕導覽
十、陳翊綾：文化政策
十一、臺北曲藝團中大公演
